## Aksaray Aşıklı Höyük: Tarihin Derinliklerine Bir Yolculuk

Aksaray'ın incisi **Aksaray Aşıklı Höyük**, tarih meraklıları ve seyahat severler için eşsiz bir durak. ## Aksaray Aşıklı Höyük: A Journey into the Depths of History

Aksaray Aşıklı Höyük, the pearl of Aksaray, is a unique stop for history buffs and travel lovers alike. This fascinating archaeological site offers its visitors an unforgettable experience with its ruins and impressive recreations that shed light on 9000 years ago. Get ready to discover this important point that you must see during your Aksaray trip.

### The Fascinating History of Aşıklı Höyük

Aşıklı Höyük is located approximately 25 km from Aksaray city center, within the borders of Kızılkaya village. Excavations that have been ongoing for more than 25 years have revealed important findings from the Neolithic period. At the entrance of the mound, life-size replicas of houses rebuilt using experimental archeology methods reveal the lifestyle of that period. These recreations cover a wide range, from semi-submerged houses dating back to the 9th millennium BC to rectangular planned mud-brick buildings dating back to the 8th millennium BC.

### What Can You See in Aşıklı Höyük?

When you visit Aşıklı Höyük, you will have the opportunity to closely follow the traces of prehistoric life. Here are some highlights that await you:

*   **Semi-Submerged Houses:** These houses, dating back to the 9th millennium BC, offer important information about the architecture of that period.
*   **Rectangular Planned Mud-Brick Buildings:** These structures, dating back to the 8th millennium BC, are an important indicator of the Neolithic period's transition to settled life.
*   **Experimental Field:** In addition to hackberry, wild almonds, and wild plums, the wild wheat field, which is sown every year by Aşıklı Project researchers and harvested with obsidian tools, reveals the agricultural practices of that period.
*   **Recreations Inside the Houses:** The finds and recreations exhibited inside the houses offer important clues about the daily lives of prehistoric people. For example, the recreation showing that the walls were knitted with sun-dried mud-brick blocks and that the flat-roofed houses were entered via wooden stairs from a gap left on the roof helps you understand the lifestyle of that period.

### Why Should You Visit Aşıklı Höyük?

*   **Witness History:** Aşıklı Höyük, as an important settlement of the Neolithic period, sheds light on an important period of human history.
*   **Discover the Lifestyle:** The recreations and finds in the mound help you understand the lifestyle, houses, agricultural practices, and social relationships of the people of that period.
*   **Experience Cultural Heritage:** Aşıklı Höyük is an important part of the region's rich cultural heritage. By experiencing this heritage on site, you can witness the history and culture of the region more closely.
*   **Discover Aksaray:** Aşıklı Höyük has an important place on the list of places to visit in Aksaray. With this visit, you can also find the opportunity to discover the other historical and natural beauties of Aksaray.

### Tips When Planning Your Visit

Considering some important information before visiting Aşıklı Höyük will make your visit more enjoyable:

*   **Transportation:** Aşıklı Höyük is located approximately 25 km from Aksaray city center. You can provide transportation by private vehicle or public transportation.
*   **Entrance Fee:** **0-18 years old - Young people and children who are citizens of the Republic of Turkey: Free, 0 - 8 years old - Foreign national children: Free, 65 years and older - T.C. Citizens: Free, Student (Students studying art history, archeology and museology at Universities): Free, Adult (All local and foreign adults): Free**. However, it is best to check the museum's official resources for current admission conditions and fees.
*   **Visiting Hours:** Although it is stated that the museum is generally open between **Summer: 09:00 17:00, Winter: 09:00 17:00**, it is recommended that you confirm the current hours from the official website before your visit.
*   **Guidance Service:** You may consider receiving guidance service to get more detailed information about Aşıklı Höyük.
*   **Camera:** Don't forget to take your camera with you to immortalize this historical moment.

### Don't Miss Aşıklı Höyük on Your Aksaray Trip

**Aksaray Aşıklı Höyük** is not just an archaeological site, but also a living space that offers an experience intertwined with history. Visit **Aşıklı Höyük** on your **Aksaray** trip to witness 9000 years of history, discover the lifestyle of the Neolithic period, and touch the rich cultural heritage of the region. This unique experience will gain an unforgettable place in your travel memories.

### Follow the Traces of History in Aşıklı Höyük!

When you come to Aksaray, don't forget to visit **Aksaray Aşıklı Höyük**. This historical and cultural heritage will take you on a fascinating journey. We wish you a pleasant trip in advance!

### La fascinante historia de Aşıklı Höyük

Aşıklı Höyük se encuentra aproximadamente a 25 km del centro de la ciudad de Aksaray, dentro de las fronteras del pueblo de Kızılkaya. Las excavaciones que se han llevado a cabo durante más de 25 años han revelado importantes hallazgos del período Neolítico. En la entrada del montículo, las réplicas de tamaño natural de las casas reconstruidas utilizando métodos de arqueología experimental revelan el estilo de vida de ese período. Estas recreaciones cubren una amplia gama, desde casas semisumergidas que datan del noveno milenio a. C. hasta edificios de adobe de planta rectangular que datan del octavo milenio a. C.

### ¿Qué puedes ver en Aşıklı Höyük?

Cuando visites Aşıklı Höyük, tendrás la oportunidad de seguir de cerca las huellas de la vida prehistórica. Estos son algunos aspectos destacados que te esperan:

*   **Casas Semisumergidas:** Estas casas, que datan del noveno milenio a. C., ofrecen información importante sobre la arquitectura de ese período.
*   **Edificios de Adobe de Planta Rectangular:** Estas estructuras, que datan del octavo milenio a. C., son un indicador importante de la transición del período Neolítico a la vida sedentaria.
*   **Campo Experimental:** Además del almez, las almendras silvestres y las ciruelas silvestres, el campo de trigo silvestre, que es sembrado cada año por los investigadores del Proyecto Aşıklı y cosechado con herramientas de obsidiana, revela las prácticas agrícolas de ese período.
*   **Recreaciones Dentro de las Casas:** Los hallazgos y recreaciones exhibidos dentro de las casas ofrecen pistas importantes sobre la vida diaria de los humanos prehistóricos. Por ejemplo, la recreación que muestra que las paredes estaban tejidas con bloques de adobe secados al sol y que las casas de techo plano se ingresaban a través de escaleras de madera desde un espacio dejado en el techo te ayuda a comprender el estilo de vida de ese período.

*   **Descubre el estilo de vida:** Las recreaciones y los hallazgos en el montículo te ayudan a comprender el estilo de vida, las casas, las prácticas agrícolas y las relaciones sociales de las personas de ese período.

Sin embargo, es mejor consultar los recursos oficiales del museo para conocer las condiciones y tarifas de admisión actuales.

*   **Servicio de guía:** Puedes considerar recibir un servicio de guía para obtener información más detallada sobre Aşıklı Höyük.
*   **Cámara:** No olvides llevar tu cámara contigo para inmortalizar este momento histórico.

Visita **Aşıklı Höyük** en tu viaje a **Aksaray** para presenciar 9000 años de historia, descubrir el estilo de vida del período Neolítico y tocar el rico patrimonio cultural de la región. Esta experiencia única ganará un lugar inolvidable en tus recuerdos de viaje.

### 아슬르크 회위크의 매혹적인 역사

### 아슬르크 회위크에서 무엇을 볼 수 있습니까?

*   **반쯤 잠긴 집:** 기원전 9천년으로 거슬러 올라가는 이 집들은 그 시대의 건축에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.
*   **직사각형 계획의 진흙 벽돌 건물:** 기원전 8천년으로 거슬러 올라가는 이 구조는 신석기 시대의 정착 생활로의 전환을 보여주는 중요한 지표입니다.
*   **실험 필드:** 팽나무, 야생 아몬드, 야생 자두 외에도 아슬르크 프로젝트 연구원이 매년 심고 흑요석 도구로 수확하는 야생 밀밭은 그 시대의 농업 관행을 보여줍니다.

*   **घरों के अंदर पुनर्निर्माण:** घरों के अंदर प्रदर्शित निष्कर्ष और पुनर्निर्माण प्रागैतिहासिक लोगों के दैनिक जीवन के बारे में महत्वपूर्ण सुराग प्रदान करते हैं। उदाहरण के लिए, पुनर्निर्माण से पता चलता है कि दीवारों को धूप में सुखाकर बनाई गई मिट्टी की ईंटों से बुना गया था और समतल छतों वाले घरों को छत में छोड़े गए एक अंतराल से लकड़ी की सीढ़ियों के माध्यम से पहुँचा जाता था, जिससे आपको उस अवधि की जीवन शैली को समझने में मदद मिलती है।

*   **इतिहास को देखें:** आशिकली होयुक, नवपाषाण काल ​​की एक महत्वपूर्ण बस्ती के रूप में, मानव इतिहास के एक महत्वपूर्ण काल को उजागर करता है।
*   **जीवनशैली की खोज करें:** टीले में पुनर्निर्माण और निष्कर्ष आपको उस अवधि के लोगों की जीवनशैली, घरों, कृषि पद्धतियों और सामाजिक संबंधों को समझने में मदद करते हैं।
*   **सांस्कृतिक विरासत का अनुभव करें:** आशिकली होयुक क्षेत्र की समृद्ध सांस्कृतिक विरासत का एक महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है। इस विरासत का स्थल पर अनुभव करके, आप इस क्षेत्र के इतिहास और संस्कृति को करीब से देख सकते हैं।
*   **अक्सराय का अन्वेषण करें:** अक्सराय में घूमने लायक जगहों की सूची में आशिकली होयुक का एक महत्वपूर्ण स्थान है। इस यात्रा के साथ, आप अक्सराय की अन्य ऐतिहासिक और प्राकृतिक सुंदरता का पता लगाने का अवसर भी पा सकते हैं।
